conclusion: Identify the given data: Temperature at state A is -73Â°C (200 K), pressure at state A is 3x10^5 Pa, volume at state A is 1x10^-3 m^3, pressure at state C is 1x10^5 Pa, volume at state C is 3x10^-3 m^3.
